snippet.title: NULLPTR - Demo is out now!
snippet.description:
This is an action puzzle game where you play the role of a hacker invading servers to steal data. Manipulate security systems and enemies with your actions in order to build safe routes to the databases.

Play the demo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1579650/nullptr/

#indiegame #indiedev #gamedev #gaming #hacker #cyberpunk #puzzlegame #game #puzzlegames #indiegames #hackergame
